item.title: HackTheBox: Horizontall
item.description: Horizontall Intro Welcome to my very first writeup! I am just starting out my infosec journey, and this box was my first ‘real’ challenge. Although it is rated ‘Easy’, I had to apply all of my current knowledge to snag both flags. Let’s crack straight into it! Reconnaissance Machine tags: Linux CMS Exploit Outdated Software CVE Injection RCE Account Misconfiguration The tags on the machine alone gives us a pretty good idea of what we’ll be up against.
